prompts: Create a frosty Pokemon that resembles an icy mountain creature with fur made of snow.
Imagine a powerful Ice/Grass type Pokemon that blends in perfectly with snowy forests.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a snowman decorated with icy blue accents and sharp claws.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in cold climates, featuring a mix of white and teal colors.
Design a mythical creature with a majestic ice crown and a forest guardian personality.
Give me an evolution of a snow-related Pokemon with impressive ice powers and unique features.
Make a Pokemon that can control winter storms, marked by its snowy appearance and strong presence.
